comp

Class RobotRotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp.RobotOperation
      • comp.RobotRotation

  • public class RobotRotation
extends RobotOperation
    Provides a mechanism to move a robot by a certain distance. Requires no knowledge of the RobotOperationTracker in which it is embedded.
    Author:
    Elijah Mas
